metadata.description: It should come as no surprise to learn that within the superhero "community," egos run rampant.  But how does all that free-flowing narcissism impact those just outside the spotlight?  Chicago finds out when five of the city's most loyal Sidekicks finally grow tired of being disrespected by both the prima donnas they work with and the citizenry they strive to protect.  And it's not like the Windy City needs yet another labor upheaval...
metadata.name: Side Kicked
